c1.name: Scarlet Hills
c1.descriptionRaw:
Decreases <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color>'s CD by 10%.
Using <color=#FFD780FF>Kazuha Slash</color> resets the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color>.
c1.description:
Decreases Chihayaburu's CD by 10%.
Using Kazuha Slash resets the CD of Chihayaburu.

c2.name: Yamaarashi Tailwind
c2.descriptionRaw:
The Autumn Whirlwind field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Kazuha Slash</color> has the following effects:
· Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200 for its duration.
· Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.
c2.description:
The Autumn Whirlwind field created by Kazuha Slash has the following effects:
· Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200 for its duration.
· Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

c3.name: Maple Monogatari
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Chihayaburu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Oozora Genpou
c4.descriptionRaw:
#When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
·{LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tapping}{LAYOUT_PC#Pressing}{LAYOUT_PS#Pressing} or Holding <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color> regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.
·When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.
c4.description:
When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
·Pressing or Holding Chihayaburu regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.
·When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.

c5.name: Wisdom of Bansei
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kazuha Slash</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Kazuha Slash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Crimson Momiji
c6.descriptionRaw: After using <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Kazuha Slash</color>, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo Infusion</color> for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks by 0.2%.
c6.description: After using Chihayaburu or Kazuha Slash, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an Anemo Infusion for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks by 0.2%.
